title: How to Perform Multi-touch Actions in Mobile App in Katalon Studio
description: Multi-touch action often appears in gaming applications. This   tutorial shows you how to perform a multi-touch action at four   different points simultaneously. We will use the MultiTouch     Tester app to demonstrate automation testing on this   typical behavior. Please download:
